original_title: America In Concert Live at the Sydney Opera House
overview: 30 years after they hit the top of the charts with "A Horse With No Name" and became serial hitmakers through the `70s, notching up 11 U.S. Top 40 singles and 17 gold, platinum, and multiplatinum albums, DEWEY BUMMELL and GERRY BECKLEY are back on the road in concert. Now you can take your very comfortable front row seat at the Sydney Opera House as AMERICA bring you their unique mellow harmonics and appealing blend of rock, pop and folk. Relive the experience or finally catch the ocncert event you thought you's missed. Combining all their hits with plenty of surprises, LIVE AT THE SYDNEY OPERA HOUSE will have you rockin' and crusin' back down the "Ventura Highway."
tagline: Featuring all their hits, including: A Horse With No Name, Ventura Highway, Sister Golden Hair, Tin Man, You can Do Magic, and many more.
title: America In Concert Live at the Sydney Opera House
